meanings.sent1: I cooked a delicious soup with haricot beans for dinner.
meanings.sent2: The haricot beans in the salad added a nice texture.
meanings.sent3: Why did the haricot bean refuse to jump into the pot? It was too cool for soup!
meanings.sent4: The haricot bean, a tiny pearl of nutrition, nestled among the other ingredients.
meanings.sent5: The haricot bean, like a miniature moon, floated in the broth.

meanings.definition: A stew or soup made with this bean.
meanings.sent1: Grandma's haricot stew always warms my heart on cold days.
meanings.sent2: The aroma of the haricot soup filled the kitchen with comfort.
meanings.sent3: Why did the haricot stew break up with the vegetable medley? It found a new stock!
meanings.sent4: The haricot soup, a savory hug in a bowl, embraced my taste buds.
meanings.sent5: The haricot stew, a flavorful blend of memories, simmered on the stove.

meanings.definition: A variety of French green bean.
meanings.sent1: The haricot beans from France are known for their delicate flavor.
meanings.sent2: I prefer using haricot beans in my salads for a touch of elegance.
meanings.sent3: Why did the haricot bean wear a beret? It wanted to be a French cutie!
meanings.sent4: The haricot bean, a green wand of freshness, graced the plate.
meanings.sent5: The haricot bean, like a slender emerald, stood out in the vegetable patch.
